thread.title: ENGEL/L

author: ENGEL/L
title: ENGEL/L
text:
I didn't want to use this site because you had to give your email and phone number. But I went ahead anyway.
Lamar called me back and found an amazing price for RT San Fran-Roma.
He was patient with my indecision and checked out all the possibilities for me. He didn't make me wait on the line, either. He said he'd research the possibilities and call me back! FANTASTICO!!!
Make sure you ask for Lamar! I will definitely call him again!
I give Lamar a "4.5" instead of a "5" only because he didn't ask me for a seat assignment. I called him back though about 5 minutes later, and asked for seats. He again very pleasantly found out that he could get me some seat assignments for free, but others, no (not w/o extra charges.)
